text:
I'm trying to use POI with the JasperReport project " but when the number of 
rows is to important i can't open the xls file a generate.
The excel i use is MS 2000.
There's no problem if a cut the rows in multiple sheets.

Can you help me ?
creator: laurent.duc@norbert-dentressangle.com

text:
This is how Jasper uses POI.  Furthermore this is a question (albiet a very
poorly done one) and not a bug report. 

http://nagoya.apache.org/wiki/apachewiki.cgi?POIBugReport
